function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improper dispersion of nanomaterials like graphene and MNPs may lead to reduced antimicrobial activity, allowing pathogens to spread","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogen spreading and contamination in built environments","Mitigation":"Ensure proper dispersion of nanomaterials and regular testing for antimicrobial effectiveness","Technologies":"Advanced dispersion techniques, nanomaterial characterization tools","People":"Occupants of built environments, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Manufacturers, building operators, facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate sterilization of frequently used surfaces can lead to continued transmission of pathogens","Impact":"Continued spread of viruses and bacteria, leading to increased infection rates","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough sterilization of frequently touched surfaces, use of effective and safe disinfection methods","Technologies":"Advanced sterilization technologies, safer disinfection chemicals","People":"General public, healthcare workers, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Overuse of surface disinfectant chemicals like sodium hypochlorite, hydrogen peroxide, or alcohol can have toxic effects and irritate occupants","Impact":"Health hazards for occupants and workers, potential environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Use of safe and approved disinfectant chemicals, proper training on chemical use and ventilation","Technologies":"Safer disinfectant formulations, chemical safety monitoring tools","People":"Occupants of built environments, healthcare workers, cleaning staff","Owner":"Facility management, public health organizations, chemical manufacturers"}]}
